gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 157, Hawks 115
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers put up 150+ points for the fourth time this season as they defeated the Hawks, 157-115. Myles Turner led the way for the Pacers with 31 points, 12 rebounds and four blocks, while Pascal Siakam added 28 points and six rebounds in the victory. Dejounte Murray tallied 32 points (4-6 3PT FG) for the Hawks in the losing effort. The Pacers finish the regular season at 47-35, while the Hawks finish 36-46.
